subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tom Glavine, the 43-year-old Braves pitcher coming off elbow surgery, out performed the 27-year-old John Maine when the Braves walloped the Mets, 12-1, on Saturday.
snippet: Tom Glavine, the 43-year-old Braves pitcher coming off elbow surgery, out performed the 27-year-old John Maine when the Braves walloped the Mets, 12-1, on Saturday.
